description: The proposed project involves the construction of a new building to accommodate the commissionaires to perform the required traffic control functions. The new construction will provide ample space for this need.
full_summary:
# **Canada Government Tender Announcement: Construction of PRTC Guard House**

**Tender Information**

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01012373
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: M2989-2-0135A
* **Publish Date**: November 3, 2022

**Project Description**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites contractors to bid on a project to construct a 26 gross square meter building at the Pacific Region Training Centre site in Chilliwack, BC. The new guard house is required to house traffic control personnel. The building will be designed to accommodate the necessary equipment and facilities for the personnel.

**Selection Process**

The selection process is a two-phase process. Phase One involves submitting qualifications and experience, while Phase Two requires the submission of pricing. Suppliers are invited to submit bids in the first phase of the selection procedure.

**Bid Submission Requirements**

* Phase One submission must be electronic and submitted to E_Pacific_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca by email.
* The electronic bid must be received on or before the specified date and time.
* The bid must include the solicitation number and relevant information.
* Phase One Qualifications Form and associated documents must be in PDF format.

**Important Notes**

* Bids sent in hard copy or transmitted by facsimile will not be accepted.
* The RCMP has restrictions on incoming email messages, including maximum file sizes and unacceptable file formats.
* Security of bid data is the responsibility of the bidder.

**Contract Information**

* The expected start date of the contract is upon awarding the contract.
* The expected completion date is March 31, 2023.

**Procurement Details**

* The project is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The project location is in British Columbia.
* The contracting entity is the Royal Canadian Mounted Police.

**Contact Information**

* Martin Bev, RCMP, beverly.martin@rcmp-grc.gc.ca, 604-679-8264.

**Document Access**

The complete tender document is available at [Canada Buy & Sell website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/03/5bfe11937f76d37ca1e519cbed769d9b/english_-_itt_two_phase_-_m2989-2-0135.pdf).

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Crown retains the right to negotiate
